description: Building upon skills learned in Chemistry 253, 254, students perform multi-step syntheses that require the use of advanced techniques for purifying and characterizing compounds. The second half of the course may focus on a project chosen by each student in consultation with the instructor. Prerequisites: Chemistry 253, 254. P/N only. Offered Spring Semester.
name: Adv Synthesis Lab
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Chemistry 253, 254. P/N only. Offered Spring Semester.
title: Advanced Synthesis Laboratory
